list.title: API
list.description: The base URL for the Philippine address API.All subsequent API calls will prepend this URL.

list.title: CACHE_TTL
list.description: Cache Time-To-Live in milliseconds.The default value (1 hour) determines how long cached data remains valid.

list.title: barangays
list.description: Returns a promise that resolves to the barangays data for a given city code.

list.title: barangaysCache
list.description: Cache for barangays data, keyed by "barangays-" concatenated with the city code.

list.title: cities
list.description: Returns a promise that resolves to the cities data for a given province code.

list.title: citiesCache
list.description: Cache for cities data, keyed by "cities-" concatenated with the province code.

list.title: constructAddress
list.description: Constructs a full address string from an object with the address parts.The object should contain properties corresponding to the address segments,such as region, province, city, and barangay.

list.title: loadBarangays
list.description: Fetches barangay data for a given city code from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: loadCities
list.description: Fetches cities data for a given province code from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: loadProvinces
list.description: Fetches province data for a given region code from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: loadRegions
list.description: Fetches region data from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: provinces
list.description: Returns a promise that resolves to the provinces data for a given region code.

list.title: provincesCache
list.description: Cache for provinces data, keyed by "provinces-" concatenated with the region code.

list.title: regions
list.description: Returns a promise that resolves to the regions data.

list.title: regionsCache
list.description: Cache for regions data.Stores an object with a data array and a timestamp.
